product_name: Columbia Dr. Downpour Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Dr. Downpour rain jacket from Columbia takes good care of you when the rain is making you sick! The "Dr." provides complete protection from those nasty elements. Rugged yet supple, waterproof, breathable Omni-Tech(R)/nylon laminate construction keeps you dry in all conditions; factory-sealed seams. Nylon taffeta lining adds light warmth and allows moisture to move away from your skin. Vents at upper back enhance breathability. Double stormflaps surround the front zipper to keep the wind and wet from penetrating. Drawcord adjustments at hood and hem seal in warmth. Cuffs have 2-snap tab adjustments. Columbia Dr. Downpour jacket has hand pockets with both side-entry zip closures and top-entry snap-flap closures; includes zip-close Napoleon pocket. Stash additional personal items in the interior zip-close and double-slotted, drop-in pockets. Modern, classic fit.
